tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: COURAGE TO CREATE - PLAYHOUSE WEST FILM FEST INTRO
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
A short intro I was hired to Direct for the PLAYHOUSE WEST FILM FESTIVAL.
http://playhousewest.net/
Directed by: Nicholas Acosta Written by: Valerie Henderson & Nicholas Acosta Executive Producers: Valerie Henderson, Ingrid S. Clay & Travis Mitchell Director of Photography: Andrew Bender Gaffer: James Lentzch Sound: Tony Dang, Alan Weischedel & Phil Lubin Make-up: Ingrid S. Clay & Amy AudeEtte Hair & Costume: Alice L. Walker Editing & Special FX: Unrendered Media 1st AD: Jordan Barron
CAST: Ash Lendzion (JANE) Martin Donovan (DIRECTOR) Denny (THE DOG) Jerome Smith (AUDITIONER) Tony Savent (DRIVER) Tony Dang (ROBBER 1) Martin Berishsaj (ROBBER 2) Heather Morris (BELLA) Jim Parrack (EDWARD) Jonathan Lipnicki (JACOB) Lex Awad (AGENT (HANDS)) Travis Mitchell (FBI AGENT MITCHELL) Valerie Henderson (FBI AGENT HENDERSON) Ingrid S. Clay (HERSELF) William Mull (FBI HANDLER) Wolfgang Bodison (COBB) Brian Lally (APE)
VOICES: Rhonda Castaneda (FEMALE POLICE OFFICER) Nicholas Acosta (MALE POLICE OFFICER)
PRODUCTION ASSISTANTS: Hillary Burghardt Lex Awad Erica Pastore Patrick Bautista Ged Pacia Jason Causey Eric Strong Amanda Ashley Martin Berishaj Rollo Girando
SPECIAL THANKS TO: Playhouse West Robert Carnegie Tony Savant Sean Crampton Alessandro Giuseppini Golan Ramras

tva:Genre.tva:Name: FICTION/DRAMA
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Programme consisting of a prose or verse composition, resp. one telling a story, written for or as if for performance by actors, puppets or animated

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: "Holy hell I'm in Grand Theft﻿ Auto!"
Genial...﻿
WTF did i just watch? This was an explosion of Funniness and Awesomeness xD! Ashley Lendzion is Brilliant﻿
Yo,look at Hoyt off ''True Blood'' tho. I can't﻿ with Heather and Ashley ha!
i liked the top comment before i´ve even seen the clip.... so now i'm gonna watch the clip and﻿ see that i and everyone else is right about that ;)
HeMo﻿
cool!﻿
MY﻿ SISTER WROTE THIS!!!!!!!!!
Ashley Lendzion is actually amazing! I am obsessed with her! She needs her own Tv show already!!!﻿ She is a brilliant actor!
Oh Heather~﻿

I think I'm falling in love with Ashley Lendzion more than Hemo... Bizarre, but she's so funny and I'd love to be her friend :)
Does anyone else think despite that black totally﻿ isn't her color Hemo looks really gorgeous in this? Her eyes are eerily pretty.

You guys have to be﻿ honest, if it wasn't for Twilight, we wouldn't be entertained by these videos. It is BECAUSE of Twilight, these parodies are made, I﻿ just don't get the hatred. That goes the same with Rebecca Black's "Friday." It is because of the hatred, it's entertaining. Just stop hating on things and enjoy it. Twilight is twilight and this parody is﻿ a parody. No need to compare and say "This is that is better than this and that!....yada yada yada"
Everytime Ashley trips running to﻿ "Bella" and "Edward".. I snort!
Loved this so much, amazing﻿ Ashley:)
that guy is from True﻿ Blood! Hoyt! What's his name is real life?! :D
Words can't even describe how much I love Heather Morris ! She is freaking hilarious ! Also Ashley you cracked me﻿ up ! Well done girl .
Some of the coolest movies of 2011, the kookiest actors with Ashley n' Heather and loads of derision = An﻿ epic win!!! I soo needed to laugh, you lightened my day. MERCI :D
ash: "fuck it, i'm﻿ out" lol!!!
The only person that can play Bella is the one and only Kristen Stewart because I have watched lots of parodies of﻿ twilight and the only one that can play bella properly is kristen

Wow
Im speechless﻿
Some of your best work ashley??❤
love﻿ love love Ashley (sigh)
Properly? She shoes no emotion, all she does﻿ is blink, breath heavily, and bite her lip.

Reviewer.Movies: vampire diaries,lux,mercy,army wives, gossip girl etc

Reviewer.Books: Harry Potter series, Charlie Bone series, A to Z Mysteries, and other suspense books.
Reviewer.Movies: Family Guy, Disney, Nickelodeon, A Shot at Love, and other things.
Reviewer.Music: Hannah Montana, Jonas Brothers, Disney Channel Music, Pop, Pop Rock, Rock, Indie Rock, and R and B. I HATE Rap music.
Reviewer.School: Use to be in LMMS, but now, I going to LMHS!
